title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1287/96 of 3 July 1996 derogating, as regards implementation of the 1996 plan, from the timetable laid down in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92 laying down detailed rules for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1287/96 of 3 July 1996 derogating, as regards implementation of the 1996 plan, from the timetable laid down in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92 laying down detailed rules for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the implementation of the 1996 plan, notwithstanding Article 3 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92:
- withdrawal of the products from the intervention stocks may take place up to 30 November 1996, and
- the products may be distributed up to 31 January 1997.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
